trans-unit.source: Appends a new item to the end of the specified menu bar, drop-down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu

seg-source.mrk: Appends a new item to the end of the specified menu bar, drop-down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu

target.mrk: Appends a new item to the end of the specified menu bar, drop-down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu

trans-unit.source: Specifies flags to control the appearance and behavior of the new menu item:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies flags to control the appearance and behavior of the new menu item:

target.mrk: Specifies flags to control the appearance and behavior of the new menu item:

trans-unit.source: $MF_BITMAP - Uses a bitmap as the menu item

seg-source.mrk: $MF_BITMAP - Uses a bitmap as the menu item

target.mrk: $MF_BITMAP - Uses a bitmap as the menu item

trans-unit.source: $MF_CHECKED - Places a check mark next to the menu item. If the application provides check-mark bitmaps, this flag displays the check-mark bitmap next to the menu item.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_CHECKED - Places a check mark next to the menu item.
If the application provides check-mark bitmaps, this flag displays the check-mark bitmap next to the menu item.

target.mrk: $MF_CHECKED - Places a check mark next to the menu item.
If the application provides check-mark bitmaps, this flag displays the check-mark bitmap next to the menu item.

trans-unit.source: $MF_DISABLED - Disables the menu item so that it cannot be selected, but the flag does not gray it.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_DISABLED - Disables the menu item so that it cannot be selected, but the flag does not gray it.

target.mrk: $MF_DISABLED - Disables the menu item so that it cannot be selected, but the flag does not gray it.

trans-unit.source: $MF_ENABLED - Enables the menu item so that it can be selected, and restores it from its grayed state.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_ENABLED - Enables the menu item so that it can be selected, and restores it from its grayed state.

target.mrk: $MF_ENABLED - Enables the menu item so that it can be selected, and restores it from its grayed state.

trans-unit.source: $MF_GRAYED - Disables the menu item and grays it so that it cannot be selected.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_GRAYED - Disables the menu item and grays it so that it cannot be selected.

target.mrk: $MF_GRAYED - Disables the menu item and grays it so that it cannot be selected.

trans-unit.source: $MF_MENUBARBREAK - Functions the same as $MF_MENUBREAK for a menu bar. For a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu, the new column is separated from the old column by a vertical line.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_MENUBARBREAK - Functions the same as $MF_MENUBREAK for a menu bar.
For a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu, the new column is separated from the old column by a vertical line.

target.mrk: $MF_MENUBARBREAK - Functions the same as $MF_MENUBREAK for a menu bar.
For a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu, the new column is separated from the old column by a vertical line.

trans-unit.source: $MF_MENUBREAK - Places the item on a new line (for a menu bar) or in a new column (for a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu) without separating columns.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_MENUBREAK - Places the item on a new line (for a menu bar) or in a new column (for a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu) without separating columns.

target.mrk: $MF_MENUBREAK - Places the item on a new line (for a menu bar) or in a new column (for a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu) without separating columns.

trans-unit.source: $MF_OWNERDRAW - Specifies that the item is an owner drawn item.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_OWNERDRAW - Specifies that the item is an owner drawn item.

target.mrk: $MF_OWNERDRAW - Specifies that the item is an owner drawn item.

trans-unit.source: Before the menu is displayed for the first time, the window that owns the menu receives a $WM_MEASUREITEM message to retrieve the width and height of the menu item.

seg-source.mrk: Before the menu is displayed for the first time, the window that owns the menu receives a $WM_MEASUREITEM message to retrieve the width and height of the menu item.

target.mrk: Before the menu is displayed for the first time, the window that owns the menu receives a $WM_MEASUREITEM message to retrieve the width and height of the menu item.

trans-unit.source: The $WM_DRAWITEM message is then sent to the window procedure of the owner window whenever the appearance of the menu item must be updated.

seg-source.mrk: The $WM_DRAWITEM message is then sent to the window procedure of the owner window whenever the appearance of the menu item must be updated.

target.mrk: The $WM_DRAWITEM message is then sent to the window procedure of the owner window whenever the appearance of the menu item must be updated.

trans-unit.source: $MF_POPUP - Specifies that the menu item opens a drop down menu or submenu.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_POPUP - Specifies that the menu item opens a drop down menu or submenu.

target.mrk: $MF_POPUP - Specifies that the menu item opens a drop down menu or submenu.

trans-unit.source: The $iNewItem parameter specifies a handle to the drop down menu or submenu.

seg-source.mrk: The $iNewItem parameter specifies a handle to the drop down menu or submenu.

target.mrk: The $iNewItem parameter specifies a handle to the drop down menu or submenu.

trans-unit.source: This flag is used to add a menu name to a menu bar, or a menu item that opens a submenu to a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

seg-source.mrk: This flag is used to add a menu name to a menu bar, or a menu item that opens a submenu to a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

target.mrk: This flag is used to add a menu name to a menu bar, or a menu item that opens a submenu to a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

trans-unit.source: $MF_SEPARATOR - Draws a horizontal dividing line. This flag is used only in a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

seg-source.mrk: This flag is used only in a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

target.mrk: This flag is used only in a drop down menu, submenu, or shortcut menu.

trans-unit.source: The line cannot be grayed, disabled, or highlighted. The $vNewItem and $iNewItem parameters are ignored.

seg-source.mrk: The line cannot be grayed, disabled, or highlighted.

target.mrk: The line cannot be grayed, disabled, or highlighted.

trans-unit.source: $MF_STRING - Specifies that the menu item is a text string. The $vNewItem parameter is a string.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_STRING - Specifies that the menu item is a text string.

target.mrk: $MF_STRING - Specifies that the menu item is a text string.

trans-unit.source: $MF_UNCHECKED - Does not place a check mark next to the item. If the application supplies check mark bitmaps, this flag displays the clear bitmap next to the menu item.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_UNCHECKED - Does not place a check mark next to the item.
If the application supplies check mark bitmaps, this flag displays the clear bitmap next to the menu item.

target.mrk: $MF_UNCHECKED - Does not place a check mark next to the item.
If the application supplies check mark bitmaps, this flag displays the clear bitmap next to the menu item.

trans-unit.source: Specifies either the identifier of the new menu item or, if the $iFlags parameter is set to a popup, a handle to the drop down menu or submenu.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies either the identifier of the new menu item or, if the $iFlags parameter is set to a popup, a handle to the drop down menu or submenu.

target.mrk: Specifies either the identifier of the new menu item or, if the $iFlags parameter is set to a popup, a handle to the drop down menu or submenu.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content of the new menu item. The interpretation of $vNewItem depends on whether the $iFlags parameter includes the $MF_BITMAP, $MF_OWNERDRAW, or $MF_STRING flag:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the content of the new menu item.
The interpretation of $vNewItem depends on whether the $iFlags parameter includes the $MF_BITMAP, $MF_OWNERDRAW, or $MF_STRING flag:

target.mrk: Specifies the content of the new menu item.
The interpretation of $vNewItem depends on whether the $iFlags parameter includes the $MF_BITMAP, $MF_OWNERDRAW, or $MF_STRING flag:

trans-unit.source: $MF_OWNERDRAW - Contains an application supplied value that can be used to maintain additional data related to the menu item.

seg-source.mrk: $MF_OWNERDRAW - Contains an application supplied value that can be used to maintain additional data related to the menu item.

target.mrk: $MF_OWNERDRAW - Contains an application supplied value that can be used to maintain additional data related to the menu item.

trans-unit.source: The value is in the ItemData member of the structure pointed to by the lParam parameter of the $WM_MEASUREITEM or $WM_DRAWITEM message sent when the menu is created or its appearance is updated.

seg-source.mrk: The value is in the ItemData member of the structure pointed to by the lParam parameter of the $WM_MEASUREITEM or $WM_DRAWITEM message sent when the menu is created or its appearance is updated.

target.mrk: The value is in the ItemData member of the structure pointed to by the lParam parameter of the $WM_MEASUREITEM or $WM_DRAWITEM message sent when the menu is created or its appearance is updated.
